name: Repeating (Ahmed Khalifa (Amidos))
description:
A programming puzzle game about repeating a short sequence of commands.

Inspired by Blek, Impasse, and Snazzle.

How to Play

Select a sequence of directions using the arrow buttons Click on the grid to start the simulation.
Try to get all yellow dots.

Repeating was selected for showcase at IndiePrize 2015.
